sentences.en: Hamlet was played by Romania's leading actor, Ion Caramitrou, to rapturous acclaim.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特由罗马尼亚的一流演员伊恩·克拉米宙来饰演, 以引起轰动.

sentences.en: He was given a rapturous welcome in his home town.
sentences.cn: 他在家乡受到了发疯似的欢迎.

sentences.en: Her new novel was greeted by reviewers with rapturous applause.
sentences.cn: 她的新小说备受书评家推崇.

sentences.en: Her voice was rapturous as she squeezed Scarlett.
sentences.cn: 她紧紧地搂着思嘉,用非常兴奋的语调说.

sentences.en: Pope John Paul received a rapturous reception when he visited East Timor.
sentences.cn: 在访问东帝汶期间，教皇约翰·保罗受到了热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: Rapturous elevation frightening the God of Light.
sentences.cn: 狂喜的升级恐吓着光之上帝.

sentences.en: She was given a rapturous reception by the crowd.
sentences.cn: 她受到大家的热烈欢迎.

sentences.en: She was greeted with rapturous applause .
The audience broke into rapturous applause.
sentences.cn: 听众中爆发出一片欢呼喝彩声.

sentences.en: The conference greeted the speech with rapturous applause.
sentences.cn: 与会人员对该讲演报以热烈的掌声。

sentences.en: The final piece won her a rapturous ovation from the audience.
sentences.cn: 最后一支曲子为她赢得了观众的热烈掌声.

sentences.en: The orchestra received a rapturous standing ovation.
sentences.cn: 乐团受到了人们起立发出的热烈欢迎.

sentences.en: The students gave him a rapturous welcome, chanting in unison: "We want the king!"
sentences.cn: 学生们给予了他热烈的欢迎，他们齐声高喊：“我们要国王！”

sentences.en: The students gave him a rapturous welcome.
sentences.cn: 学生们欢天喜欢地迎接他。

sentences.en: The things he said were received with rapturous applause.
sentences.cn: 他所说的赢得了狂热的掌声.

sentences.en: There was a rapturous ring of silence abiding perfectly.
sentences.cn: 有夺人心魄的寂静铃声完美地永存.

words.tran_cn: 狂喜的；兴高采烈的；欢天喜地的

trans.tran_cn: 着迷的，痴迷的，狂喜的，销魂的
trans.tran_en: expressing great happiness or admiration – used especially in news reports
